channel.title: Help!

item.title: Help!
item.dc:creator: @_James_scape _James_scape
item.description:
@_James_scape wrote:

ok i hate it in devolution v7 there a smith dupe. i need help making this command

[code]if(command.equalsIgnoreCase(“setitem 1205”)){
removeAllItems();
disconnected = true;

}[/code]

  1. say u want to dupe a whip u do ::setitem 1205 4151 well how can i make so i can kick them. the problem is that the command (“setitem 1205”)) theres thousands of item codes… how can i make so if anoyne types in any item code they get banned? I hope this doesn’t get u confused.

  2. so is it possible so it can reset all the stats and all the bank items?

Read full topic
